category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WSOM_find_set_total_limit
preference.preference_description: Determines the total number of objects that can be returned in My Teamcenter for any given search operation. This site-wide preference limits the total return count, not the per-page count determined by the WSOM_find_set_search_limit user preference. Valid Values: 0 - No limit A single positive integer. - The total number of objects to be returned to My Teamcenter for any given search operation.
